adsr.parameter

ADSR Parameter Enum

Classes

ADSRParameter

Generic enumeration.

Module Contents

class adsr.parameter.ADSRParameter[source]

Bases: enum.Enum

Generic enumeration.

Derive from this class to define new enumerations.
